name: Theodore´s Adventurous Nostalgia Trip
description:
Theodore´s Adventurous Nostalgia Trip was created within 48 hours for the Zero Words vol.2 Gamejam. The theme of the jam was "Regression".

Accompany Theodore on his nostalgic journey! Don´t forget to turn on sound :)

Coding: Julia Keppler
Art and Animation: Bastian Baier
